message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm asking for $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. However, $8,500 is below what I can accept. I'm willing to come down slightly to $9,200. This price reflects the true value of the product and the significant benefits you'll gain.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $9,200 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
